definition: to violate a taboo
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth

sentences.english: If, in this Heavenly Stems of the farm, they are taboo.
sentences.chinese: 若在這天干了農活，就屬於犯忌句號。

sentences.english: Now we can discuss topics that would have been taboo a few years ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前犯忌的話題，我們現在可以談論了。

definition: to violate a ban
to hold back from saying precisely what is on one's mind
to offend one's superiors
disgraceful (of behavior that is unfilial, rebellious or otherwise in grave breach of the norms of society)
ominous
to hand someone the swordhilt (idiom)/to give someone a hold on oneself
to avoid a taboo word or topic
to avoid a taboo word or topic/to refrain from/to avoid
to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret/to let the cat out of the bag
to anger sb/to enrage
to behead
to disrespect one's superiors/to offend one's elders
to invite disaster
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
shameful secret
disobedient to parents
to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret/to let the cat out of the bag
